articles.title: Ahead of Google Pixel 7a launch, Pixel 6a gets huge price cut! Get it at 36% discount - HT Tech
articles.description: Price of the Google Pixel 6a smartphone has fallen massively on Flipkart ahead of the Pixel 7a launch on Flipkart. Here is how much you need to pay to get the phone.
articles.content: Google is all set to unveil the Pixel 7a at its Google I/O event on Wednesday, May 10, 2023. The event is scheduled to kickstart at 10 AM PT or 10:30 PM IST and just ahead of its launch the price of … [+2372 chars]

articles.title: Tidal Surprises: Researchers Unravel the Secret Behind Greenland's Ice Meltdown - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Study suggests extent of future sea level rise could be vastly underestimated. New research has found that the grounding line of Greenland's Petermann Glacier shifts during tidal cycles, allowing warm seawater to accelerate ice melt. This previously unknown i…
articles.content:

articles.title: How to watch the Google I/O 2023 keynote live - TechCrunch
articles.description: Here's how you can watch Google's 2023 I/O developer conference keynote, which kicks off 10AM PT on Wednesday May 10th.
articles.content: Happy developer conference season to you and yours. Googles return to an in-person I/O should be an exciting one. For the first time since the beginning of the pandemic, TechCrunch will be on-hand at… [+1290 chars]

articles.author: Molly Campbell
articles.title: Neanderthal Gene Influences Modern Human Nose Shape - Technology Networks
articles.description: A new study from University College London (UCL) and collaborators finds that genetic material inherited from Neanderthals can affect the nose shape of modern humans. The research is published in Communications Biology.
